snippet: A prosecutor introduced evidence at the trial in Washington tied to Roger Clemens’s former trainer, Brian McNamee.
abstract: MLB Roundup; jurors in Roger Clemens's perjury trial get first look at evidence; other news noted; MLB results noted.
lead_paragraph: A prosecutor introduced evidence at the trial in Washington tied to Roger Clemens’s former trainer, Brian McNamee.
